body: I like Very Nice
she's fuck and bitch

Make her come home one day with all her fuck buddies  to find him in the bathtub with slit wrists  with a note that says "You never loved me. Goodbye" Will anyone care? What if the police find video evidence of what they all did to him (he hid it away and they find it). Isn't there a law about assisted suicide by making him want to kill himself?
This extra has no extra pages

1 page of pure pain. Also, nice character breakdown @ravenleaf. I never figured out the thought process of MC's girlfriend, and your explanation makes a lot of sense. MC definitely needs to hook up with glasses chick instead. Still a shit situation all around though
@BZo1480 if that happened, it would be as legendary as emergence

@Ravenleaf Oh I know, I'd just like to see it actually happen.Which is a shame because it probably won't. The other girls tying her up and forcing her to watch as Satoshi loses his virginity right in front of her and the resulting breakdown would be a really juicy way to end everything not to mention something entirely different from what other stories like this have done.

@BZo1480 it's already hinted she'd lose her shit if that happens. He still represents a part of her she wanted to keep pure and untainted, he belongs to her and is the one thing in her life that isn't sex but a warped sense of love. She's been very clear on how its okay for the others to abuse him, but they can't do anything that will lay claim to him or take away his "purity". She'd go full yandere/busted if it happens, which I'd like to see honestly. She doesn't deserve her happiness. The MC being in a fucked relationship is a given, no pity for him there, I don't think he should escape it. But she doesn't deserve any happy ending.
I'll finish the rest of the pages tomorrow, damn they're many.

It's more than likely impossible for him to ever be in a normal relationship, but I'd love to see how she'd react if someone swooped in and took him away from her since she'd have no more outlet for her sadism.

This shouldn't be the end, but I lost interest too at this point. She's just being a bitch for the hell of it. It'll only be redeemed to me if he winds up with one of the other girls. His life will be fucked up still, but they seem to actually like him.
Ravenleaf thanks for explanation, i didnt even bother reading this after i realised how fucked up this is, but i stuck around to find out how will this end

Just to clarify: At first, she is still in love with him and didn't want to break up with him. But then she found out he was a virgin, and in her broken mind since she got gang raped and ruined, she wound up wanting to have him keep his virginity both because she cared and out of spite for him still keeping his virginity while she got literally screwed. She wanted to preserve it and keep the relationship, ergo make him a cuck, so she could get her mind break sex in while keeping him, her "pure" side. But by this point? all that is gone, she is just cruel to be cruel. The guy should take up other girl's offer and go become one of their pets. It would still be a fucked up relationship, but they seemed to legit care for him

NGL, it was honestly better when she actually loved him. Like she wanted to turn him into a cuck, but that's only because she was mentally fucked but didn't want to give up on him because she actually loved him to a degree. At this point though, there is no signs of that love anymore, her only thing is getting off on his misery, so...yeah. It's just gotten lame. Like I don't care about the cuck aspect and stuff, it was interesting at first when she cared about him still, but I don't buy it anymore.
Umm...a little more pages please.
Ya really that lazy or sum shit?
This is still going on?
Literally netorate in the name, but not in the tags wtf
XD!!!!!! Please tell me this mean we are getting more. It may not be for everybody, but dang it, been loving this series XD

Please seek help. You're very unhealthy if you view this as positive.
